member.name: T:GameCore.Localization.LocalizedString
member.summary: Represents a localized string that automatically resolves its value from the localization system using a key.
member.param: The localization key used to lookup the string value.
member.remarks: This class provides lazy loading of localized strings and automatic fallback to the key if the resource is not found. It supports implicit conversion from and to string for convenience.

member.name: M:GameCore.Localization.LocalizedString.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Represents a localized string that automatically resolves its value from the localization system using a key.
member.param: The localization key used to lookup the string value.
member.remarks: This class provides lazy loading of localized strings and automatic fallback to the key if the resource is not found. It supports implicit conversion from and to string for convenience.

member.name: P:GameCore.Localization.LocalizedString.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets the localization key used to lookup the string value.

member.name: P:GameCore.Localization.LocalizedString.Value
member.summary: Gets the localized string value for the current key, or null if the resource is not found.
member.remarks: The value is lazily loaded from the when first accessed. If the resource cannot be found, will be set to true.

member.name: P:GameCore.Localization.LocalizedString.ResourceNotFound
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the localization resource for this key was not found.

member.name: M:GameCore.Localization.LocalizedString.ToString
member.summary: Returns the localized string value, or the key if the value is not available.
member.returns: The localized value or the fallback key.

member.name: M:GameCore.Localization.LocalizedString.op_Implicit(GameCore.Localization.LocalizedString)~System.String
member.returns: The string representation of the localized string.

member.name: M:GameCore.Localization.LocalizedString.op_Implicit(System.String)~GameCore.Localization.LocalizedString
member.summary: Implicitly converts a key to a .
member.returns: A new instance with the specified key.
